name: Gobi or Go Home
description:
Friends stick together, enemies too. Actually, if you're a cactus pretty much everything sticks to you.

Gobi is a cactus on the run from Taklamakan, a murdery younger brother who is bent on bringing Gobi back home. Gobi must surf across four levels of desert and bird's nests to get to the safety of the "airport" and be to go be themselves. Though Gobi has a head start, Taklamakan always seems to catch up at an oddly specific interval of five minutes. Five minutes, four levels, one unstable big little brother, and too many birds to count.

Join Gobi on a short adventure of acrobatics, birds, desert and brotherly love.
